name: Eri Clicker
description:
A "Cookie Clicker" fan game made by me. 
(It's also my first game.)

Updates

v1.1
The update currently resets your game file.

- 2 new upgrades added (and also some click multipliers).
- Hovering your mouse over upgrades now shows what they do.
- Adjusted golden eri spawn rate.
- Fixed bugs.

v1.0.4
- The game has an automatic save system now.

v1.0.3
- Added golden eri sfx + upgrades sfx.
- Removed "annoying" beatbox music.
- Added "no-save" message.
- Added version number on the top left corner.

v1.0.2
- Added golden eris.

v1.0.1
- Fixed "Mute" Button.
